EmailTemplate.name: LNE 2016 AM extra DBS request
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Associate Mentor application - important extra information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your application to be an NCS Associate Mentor this summer.
As you will be turning 18 during July or August, you will need to apply for a DBS certificate before you can carry out the role. To find out more about the process, and to begin your application, please click here - https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/2016DBSinstructionsAMs.pdf.
Once you have received the certificate, you'll need to scan it and send a copy to us, and then bring the original along when you start your volunteering.
If you have any questions, do get in touch.
Kind regards,
The Challenge Society
